title: Confirm & pay
marketingOptIn: If you'd like to receive marketing information (by post, email, text message, telephone and other electronic means) please opt-in below.
marketingOptOut: One of the ways we use your information is to send you marketing information (by post, email, text message, telephone and other electronic means). If you don't want to receive marketing, opt out below.
policyLinkText: For more information on how we use your personal details please refer to our <1>Privacy Policy</1> and <3>Cookie Policy.</3>
